title: The Break: Nova's Self-Preservation Guide
description: Fifteen-year old Nova has to create a new identity at school while living an alternative life at home. Having to look out for herself, she's fared pretty well so far, but will it last? I this unpredictable Coming of Age story, a spirited young woman faces life's toughest choices. CONTAINS LANGUAGE AND REFERENCES TO SUBSTANCE ABUSE.
author: Ann Jet Sieg
